verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* king \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zacharias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Barachias, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Addo, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3068"\w* exceeding \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* thoughts: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H7181"\w* ear, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5769"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w*? \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5030"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w*?

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ordinances, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* devices, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w eleventh|strong="H6240"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* Sabath, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zacharias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Barachias, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Addo, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* bottom: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w red|strong="H0122"\w*, speckled, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w*, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*? \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* shew thee \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w trees|strong="H1918"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w been|strong="H2194"\w* \w angry|strong="H2194"\w*? \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* seventieth \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, comfortable \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* thou, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w zealous|strong="H7065"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Sion \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* anger \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wealthy|strong="H1419"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* forward \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* line \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* forth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* flow \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* things: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
And I lifted up my eyes, and saw: and behold four horns.
And I said to the angel that spoke to me: What are these? And he said to me: These are the horns that have scattered Juda, and Israel, and Jerusalem.
And the Lord shewed me four smiths.

And I said: What come these to do? and he spoke, saying: These are the horns which have scattered Juda every man apart, and none of them lifted up his head: and these are come to fray them, to cast down the horns of the nations, that have lifted up the horn upon the land of Juda to scatter it.
